inn1.comm: dropped into the off side, slightly short on the off, defended solidly
straying on the pads, tickled down to fine leg, Australia are away
banged in short on middle, rocked back, rolled his wrists over it and played it down to fine leg to get off the mark
on the pads again, pitched outside leg and came in, tried to clip it fine, got hit on the pads and scrambled a leg bye
back of a length on the off and darted back in, struck him high on the pads as he tried to defend forward, was going over
short of a good length on the off, bowled at 139 kmph, tried to defend on the back foot, got an inside edge on his thighs
a loosener, bowled at 140 kmph, left alone, just warming up there
short of a good length outside off, held its line, left alone to the keeper
similar line, bowled at 141.5 kmph, rose up and moved away a hint, leaves it be, settling into his rhythm now
much fuller and spat off the pitch, good pace, bowled at 143 kmph, Kamran Akmal collected it almost in front of his face
full on the pads, worked away to fine leg, handled well
back of a length on middle, gets back and defends it solidly towards mid-on
testing line outside off, rocks back and taps that to point
fullish outside off, gets forward and leaves it be, inviting him into the drive but Marsh isn't tempted
short of a good length on the off stump and moving away, shoulders arms to that one
driven firmly but straight to cover, full on the off and he pushes at it with a flourish but is unable to beat the in-field
short of a good length outside off, gets back and runs it down wide of Shoaib at third man, rushes back for the second as he's a little slow to react, no surprises there
banged in short, pulled away to square leg, kept it down all the way through

Haddin's into the act now, waited patiently for the first three overs and seized on it as soon as he got a chance, just a fraction short and he was onto it quickly, got back and crashed it through the off side wide of point
pushed him back with a shorter one on middle, defended cautiously back to the bowler
on the off stump, maintaining a shortish length, dabbed towards cover off the back foot
a hint of desperation there, pushed it fuller on the off, he made room and swatted it down the ground to mid-off, didn't time it well enough
short outside leg, backs away and earns a wide, straying in line but he's working up some good pace here, decent start after a long enough break
well run, just tapped it wide of cover and rushed off to the other end, sound start, chanceless so far, they've taken their time
kept a little low and got to the keeper to the bounce, good length outside off and let it through with shouldered arms
tapped wide of midwicket for a single
probing him outside off, pushed firmly to cover
on the off stump, a touch fuller, defended watchfully towards cover
on middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket and rushes off for a single, a shy at the stumps, misses and Marsh dives full length to get back, probably did his hamstring, he's in some pain now
on the off stump and shot away from the batsman, bowled at 138.9 kmph, Haddin handled it well, getting back and opening the face to guide it to point
a touch too full, and straight on middle, clipped away to fine leg
slightly short of a length and moved back in, hit through the line, pushing it straight to mid-off, a touch uppish but safe
bringing it back in again, got back and punched it wide of mid-off for a quick single
slower one, bowled at 117 kmph, picked it, it's a touch full on the off, opens the face to play it down to third man
short outside off and gets some good bounce, Haddin lets it through
slower ball on middle, bowled at 113.2 kmph, dabbed in front of midwicket, decides against the single
pushes at it across the line, much fuller on the off, mistimes it short of mid-off but there's enough time to steal a single
short of a good length on the off, defended towards cover on the back foot
well struck, on middle and leg, pushed it through the line wide of the bowler, hit it firmly and beat the gap between mid-on and mid-off, nicely timed
short on middle, swatted down to mid-on, should have dispatched that, missed out
full on the off stump, low full toss, times it well but hits it straight to mid-off, uncharacteristic of Haddin really, unusually sedate here
hmm, it;'s getting interesting here, overpitched on middle and he struggles to get it past the bowler, drives it well, times it well but is unable to beat the gap

that was coming, a touch too full from Gul and Haddin picks the length early, strikes it cleanly over long-on for a big one, was in the slot and he didn't waste the opportunity this time, that'll ease the pressure a little
loosener, at 119.6 kmph, gets back and drops it into the off side
a touch unlucky there, short outside off, tries to chop it past point, gets an under-edge bang into the ground and over slip for a boundary, the hamstring's troubling him
good length on middle and off, defended comfortably to cover
short on middle and leg, turned wide of midwicket for a single
slower one, bowled short outside off, at 118 kmph, run down to third man
143.5 kmph, negotiated well, good length on the off and he blocks it to cover
driven straight to short cover, presented the full face but there's a fielder positioned exactly for that
short and wide, makes room and chops it away towards third man
good length on middle and off, gets forward and drops it back to the bowler
shot! Marsh is away now, slower one but too full on the pads, gets forward and drives it beautifully wide of midwicket, nice wristy stroke that, gets three
back of a length, gets back and dabs it down to third man, runs coming a lot more freely now

run out, excellent throw from the deep, Marsh has to go, chopped it down wide of a diving point, cover gives chase, drags it back in and returns a throw on the half-volley to Nasir Jamshed at the non-striker's end, there's always three there but Hauritz is slow on his feet, the bails are clipped and he's well short of his ground. Salman Butt was the fielder, excellent work
bouncer banged in on middle at around 142 kmph, ducks under it well
driven into the leg side for a single to get off the mark
short outside off, made room and chopped it down to third man
lucky, full and wide, chased it, bowled at 144 kmph, got an inside edge wide of the off stump for a couple short of fine leg
back of a length on the off, blocked to cover off the front foot
banged in short and he cashes in this time, gets back and pulls it away with disdain over square leg for a boundary, a touch quicker there, around 145 kmph but it didn't matter
slower ball bowled on a length outside off, pushed through to cover
full on the off, driven straight to cover
tickled off the back foot towards midwicket
short outside off and he backed away from it
overpitched on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
almost a waist-high no ball but it isn't given, plays it well though, guiding it to third man, the umpires had a look at each other and both agreed it was a legitimate delivery
overpitched on middle, driven down the ground to mid-on, firmly struck but couldn't beat the gap
length on the pads, flicked away to fine leg
made room and crunched it past mid-off for a single, as expecting a free swing of the arms but the length wasn't quite there
back of a length on the off, pushed to cover off the back foot
short and wide and he went after it, cracked it uppishly in front of cover, three more, didn't time it well enough but still got three for it
nicely played, opened the face there, slightly short on the off and he forced it between point and cover for a couple more
short on middle and spinning away a hint, dropped on the pitch
on middle, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
dipping it into the right hander and gets it to spin away, defended back to the bowler, good start
yorked himself there, gave it some air and he took a couple of steps down the tack, dug it out back to Afridi
straying in line, pushed it wide of leg stump, tried to sweep, didn't connect but it's a wide, and a fumble from Akmal gives them one more
leading edge there, on middle and held its line, opened the face expecting it to spin away
slightly quicker through the air, bowled from back of the hand, defended on the pitch
went after it, just a fraction short on the off, got forward and slapped it over mid-on, didn't time it all too well but well enough to find the boundary
on middle and leg, the bat turns in his hand as he tries to drive down, gets it to long-on
superbly timed, overpitched, made a bit of room and struck it sweetly down the ground to beat mid-off, sweet sound of bat hitting ball, and a nice follow through to back it up
short on the off, punched off the back foot to cover
back of a length on middle, pushed into the leg side for a single, the run-rate has hit five now
good comeback, attempted yorker on middle, almost gets it right, bowled at 137.2 kmph, Haddin digs it out and Iftikhar has a shy at the striker's end to ruffle the batsman
short on leg stump, turned away behind square
gave it a bit of air, tempting him to come down the track, lofted wide of long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
short on the off, dabbed towards point off the back foot
ticked to fine leg off the back foot, slightly short outside leg
gets back and punches it to point
shot, just a fraction overpitched, got forward, bent low and slog-swept it well over deep midwicket, struck it cleanly, not much effort there but it was brilliantly timed
hit away through the leg side behind square
short on the off, punched towards cover
threw it up and held its line as Haddin tried to chop it past point
on middle and leg, slightly short, turned it away wide of short fine
flighted on the off stump, got forward and turned it wide of midwicket, wasn;t able to beat the fielder though
slightly short on middle, spun in, played it back respectfully to the bowler, good start by Ajmal
tossed up outside off, driven through the line to long-off
dragged it short on leg stump, tried to dab it down, a bit of hesitation but they grab a single
kept low., slightly short on the off, chopped down to point
dropped, tossed up, mistimes a slog-sweep, it's sky high and Shoaib running back from midwicket  spills it, was getting away from him and he didn't judge it well enough. How costly will that prove?
driven off the front foot wide of long-on for a couple
tossed up outside leg, swept down to fine leg for a single
the doosra, picked it well, spun away after landing short outside off, made room, waited for it, and dabbed it wide of short third for a couple
short on middle and off, punched back to the bowler
struck firmly towards the non-striker's end, lobs off Haddin's bat straight to Younis Khan at cover
gets forward, covers the spin by closing the face and working it to midwicket
short on the off, much quicker, pulled away wide of Shoaib at long-on for a couple more
whipped away but straight to midwicket, these two are keeping the scoreboard ticking nevertheless, Watson's done it better than a run-a-ball
fired in down the leg side, held its line,called a wide
tossed up on leg stump, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
flighted on middle, presents the full face and pushes it back to Afridi
gets back and turns it away wide of square leg for a single

Haddin goes! Gave it some air, Haddin was drawn forward and he went through with the drive, was not entirely committed to it and hit it straight to Younis who timed his jump to perfection to snap an easy one. Shoaib will be a little relieved there
short and wide, chops it wide of point for a single
back of the hand, landed on a length on middle, reaches forward and defends
thrown up outside off, gets across the line and nudges it behind the keeper for a couple wide of fine leg
flighted on the off, driven through the line to long-off
slightly short on the off and spun in, was rapped high on the pads as he tried to play it down leg
quicker, bowled at 94.3 kmph, gets back and defends it back to Ajmal
short on the off, gets back and turns it away behind square for a single
the doosra does the trick, short of a length outside off, Clarke tried to open the face to run it down behind point, it spun away to take the outside edge and Akmal made no mistake
tossed up on the off, pushed firmly down to long-off
Symonds off the mark, fullish on middle, flicked away to deep midwicket
short, got forward, got down on one knee and pulled it away between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a couple
flighted, bowled at 110 kmph, pretty quick that, driven down to long-off
slightly short on the off, pushed to cover
short on middle and off, drops it back on the pitch, good stuff from the spinners here
tempting him outside off, leans forward and defends
gets outside the line and turns it away towards midwicket
deceived by the doosra again, short on the off and he ended up playing inside the line as it spat away
flighted on leg stump, swept down to deep square leg for a single, a bit of a niggle between Watson and Ajmal here, gives him an intimidating stare as he runs down the track
swept away to deep square leg again, fetched it from outside off
Australia in a spot of bother now, the offcutter bowled from the back of the hand, short outside off, spin it, made way for a cut behind point, gloved it straight to the keeper
quicker one, as quick as Iftikhar almost, at 130 kmph, Ferguson defended it back to the bowler
dipping into the right hander, fullish on the off, defended
gets off the mark, punches it down wide of cover for a single

He's a legpsinner, but that's actually a classic offspinner's dismissal, threw it up outside off, drawing him forward, he lunges forward to defend, the ball cuts back in sharply to beat him through the gate and the stumps are rattled
tossed up on middle, tickled to midwicket
they've failed to pick the doosra, and this is yet another instance, invited him forward and spun it away, he did well to stay rooted to the crease
on middle and off, defended into the off side
gets forward and works it away to square leg
shorter, on the off stump, the straighter one, played into the off side
short on the off, spun into him, he punches it wide of cover for a single
drifting into the batsman, gets forward and dabs it to cover
drifting into the batsman and cutting away, takes the outside edge but it lands well wide of slip
comes on the front foot, closes the face and turns it to midwicket
Afridi's on a roll! Flighted outside off, Ferguson was sucked in, came forward to force it through cover, got a thick edge and Misbah snapped it well diving to his left, Australia slide further
tossed up on the off, looks to dab it into the off side, gets a thick inside edge wide of midwicket for a single
short on middle and leg, pushed short of midwicket, calls for a single but is sent back
flighted on the off, gets forward and defends it to midwicket

bowled'im!! An embarassing dismissal that, spun in sharply from outside off, he shouldered arms to that one, not expecting it to spin as much, and hears the death rattle behind him as it clips off stump
the doosra, just hung his bat out and pushed it wide of point, gives the better batsman the strike
the better batsman gets across and sweeps it down to fine leg
tossed up on the off, defended watchfully to cover
flighted on the off again, defends it solidly in front of cover, nicely done but his side is tottering
short on middle and leg, tickles it behind short fine for two runs
gets forward and taps it back onto the pitch
pushed off the back foot into the off side
goes for the slog sweep, misses, the googly, didn;t pick that
fired down the leg side, called a wide
gets back and works it away behind square for a single
short of a length outside off and spinning in, defended off the back foot to cover
very slow through the air, on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
the straighter one, gets back and punches it towards deep cover
spins in to beat the outside edge, goes through with the drive but plays inside the line
spun away, full on the off stump and cutting away this time, follows it up with a doosra, gets forward to defend but it spits away
pushed into the off side o the front foot
flighted on the off, defended to cover
drops it back onto the pitch, it's full on middle, dabs it back

five-for for Afridi! Done in by the googly again, tossed up outside off and Bracken's eyes lit up, got forward to drive it forcefully through cover, misread the spin and was bowled through the gate. His third five-wicket haul, and his first against Australia
quicker one bowled on the off, slapped to cover
gets back and turns it wide of short fine to keep the strike
doosra again, shuffled well outside off and played across the line, was beaten and the Australian coach Nielsen has a big smile on his face
short on the off and spinning in, pushed back to the bowler
beaten all ends up, doosra again, much closer to the off stump and zipped away as he played across the line
tossed up on the off, defended with a reach
got to the pitch and drove it through the line wide of mid-off
doosra again and got some bounce this time, spat off the pitch to beat the outside edge as he tried to defend that off the back foot
tossed up on middle and off, held it back a touch, defended with a lunge
Hopes has hope in the tail-enders, works it away wide of square leg for a single
tossed up on the off, driven uppishly towards long-off
short on middle, gets back and whips it away to deep midwicket

Afridi gets his best figures in ODIs! He's mastered the googly here, tossed it up outside off, landed on a good length and zipped back in take the off stump as Clarke was beaten through the gate as he came forward to defend
end of a superb spell, rapped on the pads off the googly again but was struck outside the line, huge cheer from a partisan crowd here
flighted on middle, driven towards deep midwicket for a couple
bowled it flatter this time and it spun back in to strike him on the pads as he played across the line, was hit outside off
tossed up this time and is struck on the back pad as he tries to sweep, but again, it's outside the line
doosra, almost does him in, short on the off and he plays straight as it zips away to beat the outside edge
pushed off the back foot to long-on for a single
the straighter one, plays inside the line, gets the outside edge and it drops short of second slip
darted back in, bowled at 132.2 kmph, got forward and defended it back to the bowler
shot! Too late, but was worth a watch, overpitched, gets on the front foot and creams it through the off side wide of cover
attempted yorker on middle, bowled at 134.9 kmph, dug out into the off side
short on middle, gets back and punches it to cover
full on the off, bunts it straight to mid-off, no single taken

missed run out, full toss on middle, dabs it to cover and hesitates, Hilfenhaus is halfway down the pitch only to watch Hopes send him back, a shy at the stumps but misses, and they get overthrows, had enough time to take aim there, should have scored!
single off the first ball again, whipped away to deep midwicket
almost, beaten by the doosra for the umpteenth time, spun away to evade the outside edge as he came forward to defend
and again, played inside the line to that one, opened the face but made no contact
short on the off and spun back in to catch him on his thighs as he tried to play it off the back foot
reached forward to defend on the off side

just fell short of Nasir Jamshed, flighted, drew him forward, probably the straighter one there, dabbed at it, got the outside edge and Jamshed, who's a little too deep at slip, failed to get down in time
down the leg side, gifts them a run
back of a length, punched to long-off on the back foot
full toss on the off stump, struck straight to mid-off, they need to continue with spin here, Gul's relatively easy, that's what it seems
gets an under edge short of Akmal and they steal a quick single
some important runs here, slightly full on the off, gets forward and swings it over midwicket, used his wrists nicely there, dealing with the seamer quite well
yorker, Hopes was expecting that, made way and dabbed it towards third man for a single
low full toss on middle and leg, bowled at 137 kmph, pushed to midwicket
starts off with an absolutely horrendous wide outside off, why is Malik not being given a bowl?
full and wide, bowled at 140.2 kmph, makes room and reaches for it, misses
yorker length on middle, pushed wide of the bowler, decides against the single
slower one bowled short outside off, at 113 kmph, slapped to cover
cuts that away, its a poor ball really, makes room and slashes it behind point, these are easy runs
well struck, an unimpressive over by Shoaib, full toss on leg stump, drills it down the ground, long-off runs across, dives, and cuts it off
that's bludgeoned, I don't think we'll see more of him for the rest of the innings, short and wide again and Hopes latches onto it, blazing it between point and cover to take the score to 150
short of a good length on the off, opens the face to play it down to third man and give Hopes the strike
yorker on middle, bowled at 140.7 kmph, dug out to cover
short on middle and he deals with it well, gets back and pulls it away over square leg to beat the fielder in the deep, these two have added 33 now
short again, outside off this time, mistimes a pull to midwicket
slower ball bowled short outside off, chops it down to deep cover
low full toss outside off, pushes at it, gets an under edge and Akmal leaps to snap it well over his head, saved a certain four there
short on the off, gets back and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
doosra, deals it well, spun away but he let it go
too short, too wide, Hilfy has no reason to play at it
tucks it away behind square for a single
shot! Wasn't quite to the pitch but struck it cleanly, tossed up on the off, bend down and slog-sweeps it over deep midwicket, crucial innings this
dabs it behind square for a single to keep the strike, he's just one hit away from a well-made fifty here
overpitched on the off stump, hits it through the line to long-off, Hilfy wants a second but is sent back wisely
Hilfy plays the pull, and does so well, short on the off and he drags it to deep square leg
slower one outside off, bowled at 116 kmph, has a massive heave at it, misses, didn't pick it there
length ball on the off, pushed uppishly towards long-off
gone! Cleaned him up, straight on middle, he played across the line to work that wide of midwicket, missed it, clipped the pads and crashed into middle and off

inn2.comm: on target immediately, good length on middle and leg, defends it back to the bowler
shaping it away from the left hander, landed on a good length outside off and moved away as he left it alone
got the leading edge there, pitched it full on leg stump and got some late movement to get the edge as he tried to drive it through the leg side, missed out on a single there, was in the gap
lands on a length on the off, eases it through to mid-off
sweetly timed, just a fraction overpitched, gets to the pitch and punches it between point and cover, Pakistan are away
drew him forward with a good length ball on the off, opened the face to play it down to third man
on the off stump, held its line, defended down to point
good length on the off, bowled at 135.9 kmph, gets forward and blocks it to cover
short on the off stump, chops it down straight to point

he's given him! Australia strike early, landed on a good length on middle and leg and came on quickly to Butt as it swung in to rap him on the pads on the back foot, struck him in line with leg stump and the umpire Nadeem Ghauri raised his finger immediately
full and wide, swinging away, steers it down to third man for a single
low full toss on the off stump, bowled at 131.5 kmph, presents the full face to push it to cover
moved back in to beat the bat, landed on a good length just outside off and darted back in as he leaned forward to drive, wasn;t quite there
much fuller and he attempts a similar shot, the bat turns in his hand and it rolls down to midwicket
inswinger again, gets forward to defend, brushes the pads on the way to the keeper, not looked entirely convincing here
held its line this time, he got to the pitch and defended it to cover, much better
reaching for it outside off, not really pacy, bowled at 126.6 kmph, but accurate, dabs it back to the bowler
angling it back into the right hander, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
short on the off stump, gets back and drops it short of midwicket
back of a length again, straight on middle, bowled at 139.9 kmph, gets back and defends solidly
short of a length outside off, kept low as it swung away, Akmal could not bring his bat down in time
moved away sharply to beat the outside edge, Akmal prodded at it, was almost done in by the swing
short on the off stump, defended to cover, good start here, but they don't seem to have enough to defend
pushing him back again with a short one, he negotiates it well, getting behind it nicely and blocking it into the off side
good length on the off and moving away to beat the outside edge, Younis moves across and opens the face but misses
a touch fuller, gets forward and guides it to point, they;ve kept the lid on the batsmen here
a fraction full on middle, got forward and chipped it firmly over mid-on for a boundary, that will relieve the pressure a little
presents the full face to drive it straight to mid-off, overpitched again
getting it to leave the right hander, bowled at 119.1 kmph, hangs his bat out, gets the inside edge onto his pads
gets a single, waits for it and dabs it towards third man to keep the strike
back of a length on middle, drops it short of the bowler and calls for a single, is sent back
held it back again, got forward and tapped it to cover, taking his time here
slightly short on middle, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
banged in short, gets back and drops it with soft hands towards third man
crashed through the off side, what's more he;s overstepped, short and wide and he cuts it away getting forward between point and cover
poor ball, in the slot outside off, steps away and slices it wide of point, that should normalize things a little
short on the off, gets back and defends it watchfully towards cover
length ball on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off
angling it into the right hander, gets forward and taps it between point and cover
probing him on and outside the off stump, but not getting much movement, dabs it into the off side
came back in this time, Younis tried to cover it by getting outside the line, got an inside edge onto his pads
oooh, almost! Short of a length outside off and swung away, played away from his body there, opened the face to play it just wide of a diving slip for a boundary, lucky, and he's still there
good length on the off, gets forward and punches it to cover
straying on the pads, tries to clip it away, misses
beaten, landed on a good length outside off and shot up, and swung away as he got back to defend
held it back and got it to move away, played away from his body there, missed
isn't getting his direction right here, on the pads again, tries to whip it fine, brushes the pads on the way to the fine-leg boundary
on middle and off, gets forward and drives it straight to cover
back of a length on middle, bowled at 135 kmph, defended to midwicket
on middle and leg, bounced up to him, struck him on the ribs as he tried to play it on the leg side
on the off stump, leans forward and pushes it to cover
back of a length on middle, punched to mid-on off the back foot
shortish outside off, gentle medium at around 128 kmph, hit to cover, a quiet start this
shortish outside off, moves across a touch and dabs it towards point
reaches into the drive but isn't able to beat the in-field, stylishly played, but straight to cover
gets the outside edge well wide of slip, slightly short and moves away, he plays at it with soft hands, got some good bounce there but Pakistan will take that
back of a length on the off, jumps up and defends it in front of cover
on middle and leg, getting it to jag back in, bowled much fuller, at 138 kmph, pushed back with a full face
slowed it down and got it to cut away from the batsman, at around 120 kmph, Akmal played at it but was beaten
on middle stump, gets back and punches it wide of midwicket, things have slowed down a little here, but Pakistan have ample time
angling it into the right hander, banged in on the off stump, defended to point
fullish on the off, gets on the front foot and bunts it to mid-off

tame dismissal, they had quietened them down and one of them just had to snap! Short on the off, Younis walks across to pull it away over midwicket, mistimes it completely and he gifts an easy catch to Bracken at mid-on
swinging back in, short on the off, punches it back to the bowler
good length on the off and getting it to move away a hint, gets forward and plays hard, takes the outside edge, but all along the ground to third man
nipping it back in, bowled at 130.9 kmph, shaping in nicely but its wide enough for the batsman to let it go
short down the leg side, clips his thighs on the way to Haddin, nice tight over that, it's getting interesting here
tossed up on the off, gets across and drives it to midwicket
flighted outside off, inviting him forward, driven to cover
struck away wide of cover for a single
gave it air, played it with a closed face wide of the close-in fielder on the leg side for a single
tossed up on the off stump, driven firmly but it's fielded well at short cover
on middle and leg, gets his foot forward and places it in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on for a couple
short on the off, gets back and punches it to cover
short and wide, slashes it away to third man
angling it in from wide of the crease, defended back to the bowler
slightly short outside off, a touch too close to cut but he plays it well, opening the face at the last moment to play it down to third man
slower one bowled full outside off, at 116 kmph, pushed uppishly towards cover, who's right at the edge f the circle
too straight, gets across and tickles it down to fine leg
they've handled Hauritz well so far, this one's a touch full and he launched into the drive, striking it confidently between cover and mid-off
flighted on the off, reaches forward and pushes it towards deep cover
much flatter, on and outside off, gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, dabbed wide of point for a single, runs coming a little more freely now
quicker one bowled full outside off, played it well, moved away and dug it out behind point with an open face to get three more, brings up the 50
flat and full on the off, defended in the direction of point
he's accurate, on middle and off, defended to cover
good length on the off, gets forward and dabs it to point, you're not going to score so easily off him
just a fraction wide, is into the drive, the bat turns in his hand it rolls down wide of midwicket
short of a good length on the off, has no trouble playing down to third man
straying in line for once, full on the pads, flicked away wide of deep midwicket for a couple
slightly short outside off, moving back in, left alone to the keeper
flighted, converts it into a low full toss and slices it away to deep point
tossed up on the off, gets forward and defends it back to the bowler
presents the full face and pushes it back to the bowler again
pushed through fuller, dabbed back onto the pitch
short on middle, gets back and drops it down to short leg
quicker through the air, bowled flat on the off, spun back in and he defended it back onto the pitch
improvisation, just a fraction full on the off, got across and whipped it away over midwicket, nice use of the wrists there, a touch risky but he was confident of pulling it off
short on the off, pushed back to the bowler
offcutter, bowled at 120.1 kmph, dropped dead on the pitch, back to tuk tuk cricket
or maybe not, he forces it through the off side, overpitched and plays it uppishly on the bounce to mid-off
nipped back in, short on the off, punches it to point off the back foot
slower offcutter again, bowled at 124.9 kmph, drops it on the pitch, it rolls back towards the stumps but he brings his foot in the way to prevent any damage
nicely done, pushed through quick on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
Akmal's getting a move-on, attacking Hauritz here, quicker and full on the off, is down the track and clatters it past a diving mid-off
tossed up this time, leans forward and defends with bat close to pad
short on middle, gets back and pushes it to midwicket
kept low, and he did well to get his bat down in time, dropped it back to Hauritz
much fuller, pushed to cover, quietened down after that boundary, but this rate will do
Malik flirts with her outside off and is beaten, short and wide, got some movement away, and some bounce to beat the edge as tried to chop at that one
fuller, but a harmless delivery, too wide to induce the batsman into playing the shot, left alone
short on middle, gets back, leaps and closes the face to play it down to fine leg
short of a good length outside off, bowled at 135 kmph, chases it as it swings away, misses
shout for lbw, the faint inside edge saves him, slower one on middle, tries to hit that through the line, got a nick onto his pads
stopped on him a little, had shaped himself for a pull but probably thought that wasn't short enough,adjusted well to just drop it into the off side
short on the off, gets back and bunts it to cover
banged in short again, goes for the pull, it's onto him a little too quickly, is struck on the thighs
lucky, but it's runs, banged in short again, tries to clear square leg, bounces more than he expected, gets the top edge over the keeper, was bowled quick
four consecutive short ones, punched to midwicket this time
shot of the innings! Pushes it full this time and he picks the length early, makes way and hits it inside out wide of mid-off, bisects the gap between mid-off and cover perfectly
back to short again, dabbed in front of cover
spat off the pitch, short on middle and Malik was in a spot of bother, just blocks it in front of his face and it lobs up on the off side
good length on the off this time, bowled at 136.4 kmph, defended solidly to cover
too straight, bowling to Malik's strength, driven firmly wide of midwicket, Bracken gives chase and drags it back, but they've taken three
short and wide, not too wide to cut, he plays the shot anyway, gets the outside edge, there's no slip and it races away to the third-man boundary
in the channel outside off, gets forward and plays it to point with an open face

gone this time! Took a chance once too often, similar ball to the one that was edged for four earlier in the over, but gets some movement away from the batsman, Akmal goes after it, gets a thick edge and Haddin pouches it well moving to his right
on the off stump, gets back and punches it down to cover
short of a length on the off, pushed to cover again
on middle and leg, turns it away to fine leg for a single
bouncer banged in on middle, bowled at 137 kmph, ducks under it well
short on leg, tries to fend it away wide of square leg, is hit on the thighs
back of a length on the off, punched to cover off the back foot, things have quietened down now
good length on the off stump, gets forward and defends it cautiously to cover
went through him quickly, short outside off, too close to cut but he tries to do just that, bounced to just beat the outside edge
too wide and he cuts it firmly this time, but straight to Clarke at point
a little slower and almost had him, on middle and he played it inside out just wide of short cover, gets a single but would have been worried for a second
nicely played, a touch too full, gets across and clips it towards deep square leg for a single
jagged back in, mistimes a cut to cover, bowled at 135 kmph
short on middle, gets behind it and blocks it to mid-on
moves across and turns it away straight to square leg
good length on the off, pushes it back to the bowler
bouncer banged in on middle, he ducks under it, one for the over, another dot ball
jumped off the pitch but he dealt with the bounce well, getting across and dropping it on the off side
short of a good length on the off, pushed back to the bowler, a nice little maiden
good length outside off, angling away from the right hander, left alone
slower one, bowled at 110 kmph, defended with a reach to cover
short on the off, late-cuts it down to third man
slower one again, cutting away from the right hander, he moves across and runs it down again
bowled on a length on the off, drawing him forward, plays it to cover
fuller on the off, driven firmly but fielded brilliantly at short cover, another tidy over
short and wide, leaving the right hander, he reaches for it, gets a thick edge wide of slip and third man for a couple
good length on the off, bowled at 137 kmph, defended solidly to cover
slower offcutter, bowled at 113 kmph, pushed through to mid-on
bouncer banged in short on middle, Malik ducks under it comfortably
kept a little low, short on middle, turned it wide of square leg for a single
short on the off, chopped down to cover, taking time these two
good length on the off, reaches forward and plays it to point
on middle and off, gets on the front foot and blocks
short of a good length outside off, dabbed down to point
gentle medium that, bowled at 114 kmph, short and wide and he seizes the chance, makes room and cuts it away between point and cover
much quicker, at 130.8 kmph, drops it wide of the keeper from the crease
good length on the off, stretches forward and defends to cover
almost gets a wicket! Edged and just short of Haddin, good length on the off, came back in and kissed the outside edge as he tried to angle it to third man
defended into the off side off the back foot
much fuller, bowled at 127.4 kmph, defended to cover
short of a good length on the off, blocked to cover
teasing him outside off, overpitching it this time, left alone, Misbah taking no risks here
finally, short on the off, moves across, rolls his wrists over it to play it down towards the fine-leg boundary, that should get him going, Pakistan inch towards 100
pushed through quick, held its line as it was angled away from the batsman, Malik pushed at it, missed
pitched outside leg and came back in, turned away to deep square leg
short on the off, gets back and guides it to point
leaves it alone, good length outside off and angling away, let through to the keeper
much fuller, gets across and taps it back to the bowler
left alone again, pacy at around 138 kmph, wide enough for him to let it go
fullish on the off, moves across and pushes it back to Hopes
fullish outside off, gets forward and taps it to cover, who's at the edge of the circle

edged and Haddin takes a stunning catch! Tried to flirt with it and paid the price, a legcutter landing short outside off, he tried to run that past the keeper but couldn't get it wide enough, Haddin dived to his right, and dived low, to pluck that with his right hand inches from the ground
beaten straightaway, and they've actually appealed, zipped away after pitching short on the off, he was pushed back as he tried to defend and was beaten as it spar away
went after it, pushed fuller and he swings across the line, gets a thick inside edge to deep square leg, 100 up
shortish on middle and off, moves across and works it away fine, fine-leg is too square and they grab a couple
poor ball and he's away, full toss on leg stump and he whips it away with his wrists over square leg, things should speed up now
the crowd is roaring now, short outside off, stayed his ground and pulled it away over midwicket, why didn't he come in earlier?
cramped him this time and he played it well, good length on the off and he defended it solidly in front of the bowler
Boycott is having a hearty laugh inside the commentary box, swung at it across the line, got a thick outside edge and it spun away from third man to give them an extra run
slower one outside off, bowled at 121.6 kmph, walked across to dab it down, missed
short of a good length on the off, defended to cover off the back foot, right, so the buzz is back
slower ball probing him outside off, he flirts with it, misses
short of a good length on the off, pushed to cover
gets forward and guides it towards point
length ball on the off, moves across and drives it to midwicket
short on the off, just pokes at it without much intent
short on middle, works it away towards deep square leg, much to the chagrin of the crowd who must have wanted the more explosive partner to take strike
short of a good length outside off, at 131.3 kmph, left alone
back of a length on middle, fends it away on the leg side
short on middle, punched to midwicket on the back foot
dropped it short, much slower, at 117 kmph, chopped to point
banged in short on the off, rolls his wrists over it to play it to fine leg
short outside off, left alone to the keeper, crowd go silent as MIsbah takes strike the next over
slower one, an offcutter bowled at 111.3 kmph, guided to third man wide of a diving gully
good length on middle, defends it respectfully back to Hopes
slower one bowled short on the off, turned away behind square for a single
full on the off, driven through the line to mid-off
appeal for lbw, short and nipped back in, tries to chop it down, is hit on the pads but well outside the line
finally, overpitched and he's onto it, presents the full face as he drills that down the ground to beat mid-off
Afridi wants to be done with this, not quite to the pitch but has a good go at it, takes it from outside off and swings it over midwicket, wide of mid-on for a boundary
Hopes misfields and concedes a boundary, overpitched on the off, driven firmly down the ground but mid-off could not get his body behind it, four more
called a wide, too high, banged in short and Haddin leapt to pluck it with one hand
he can't get his hand onto it now, bouncer on leg stump and it spat off, no chance for the keeper, and that;s five runs more, the crowd doesn't mind this at all
we're heading for a speedy finish now, full on the off, length ball and he's smashed it down the ground, all power in that and poor Hopes has no chance at mid-off
gone! But it may have come a little too late here. Slower one and Afridi failed to pick it, went through with his attempt to clear the in-field, mistimed it and Bracken took a dolly at mid-on
short on leg stump, tries to turn it fine, gets a leg bye
short of a good length on the off, gets back and drops it towards , 19 off that over
short on the off stump, moves across and works it wide of short fine
the straighter one, coming round the wicket, on the off stump, dabbed into the off side
zipped away from him, good length on the off, drew him forward, spun away to beat the outside edge
stopped on him, bowled straight, much slower through the air, pushed at it hard and it lobbed up just short of mid-off
tossed up, well wide of the off, left alone
on the off stump, drifting into the left hander, defended with a lunge
short of a good length on the off, blocked to point off the back foot
slower ball bowled on a length on the off, at 113.4 kmph, pushed to cover, Misbah continues his merry way
short on the off, punched to mid-on off the back foot
short on middle, gets back and drops it dead on the pitch
sharp bouncer, took the batsman by surprise, and even Haddin, Misbah backed down and Haddin leapt to take it well above his head
turned to midwicket off the back foot, finishes his spell, but that 19-run over spoilt it for him
full and wide, drives at it hard, spins away to take the outside edge wide of slip, a bit of hesitation keeps them down to just a couple, when they should have run three
short on the off, swatted down to mid-on
pushed through to cover off the front foot
gifts them a boundary, tossed up well outside leg and Jamshed sweeps it to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
slightly quicker on leg stump and angling down, catches him on the thigs
flighted on middle, reaches forward to defend it back to the bowler
good length outside off and angling away, left alone
on and outside off, at 131.3 kmph, defended to cover
slower one at 114.8 kmph bowled full on the off, walks across and defends it into the leg side
short of a length outside off, lets it through to the keeper

short outside off again, leaving the right hander, Misbah moves across, tempting the crowd as though he's going to play it but just at the last moment, when they're praying he goes after it, he shoulders his arms
on middle and leg, pushed through to midwicket, he's in blocking mode today, difficult to change one's frame of mind
short and wide, poor start, Jamshed rocks back and forces it past cover for three runs
good running, on middle and leg, punched wide of midwicket, the fielder in the deep is a little slow to react and they scamper back for the second
pushed to midwicket and there's a fumble by Ferguson, they get a single
bowled'im! Symonds strikes, drifting into the left hander, went straight on, moved back to chop it wide of cover, got an inside edge straight onto the stumps
almost a caught-and-bowled there, short on the off and spun back in, pushed it uppishly just short of a diving Symonds, would have been interesting had that been taken
tossed up outside off, gets forward and defends it wide of point
good length outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
full and wide, goes after it, gets a thick edge over the slips towards third man for a single
short of a good length, moves across to dab it to third man, it zips past him to beat the outside edge
moves well across, it's fired in on middle and leg, got his bat to it somehow to play it to fine leg, Bracken saw him shuffle there
on the off stump, gets forward and defends to cover
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, defended watchfully
on middle and off, gets across and tickles it to square leg
short on the off, punched down past a diving midwicket where a fumble by Hauritz allows them a single
flighted outside off, gets forward and defends solidly
almost dragged it on! Tossed up and turned in sharply, he got back to dab that past the keeper, got an inside edge just wide of the off stump, two more to fine leg
short outside off and held its line, he got back, expecting it to spin into him, it doesn't and he misses
on the off stump, lunges forward and blocks
came back in, good length on the off and caught him on the ribs as he came forward to defend
short on middle and off, gets across to defend to cover
back of a length outside off, bowled at 132.2 kmph, left alone
slower one bowled full on the off stump, driven wide of the bowler to mid-off, Gul appears to be struggling for a bit but he's made it comfortably
gets forward and taps it down to mid-off, good bounce, but handled well
struck well, got forward and punched it wide of mid-off for a single, less than ten needed now
flighted on the off, gets across and pushes it back to the bowler
closes the face and works it to square leg
does it again, flighted outside off, gets across and nudges it to square leg
finally, short on the off, waits for it to spin into him, rocks back and pulls it away wide of a diving square leg
four more, flighted on the off stump, gets forward and chips it well over midwicket to beat the fielder in the deep for a boundary
full outside off, he's already made room, drilled straight to cover
It's all over, just a fraction full on the off, he swings across the line to clear mid-on to finish this off
